column1: # Labelling of the sheets for the two gauges at Mickleton Lime Kiln is ambiguous, so other assignments of sheets to gauges are possible.
# The reading for January 1877 is a partial estimate and has been retained.
# The readings for January and February 1895 are apportioned.
# The precise location of the gauges is not clear. The quoted grid reference is a reasonable fit for the location information available:
# - there are old lime kilns nearby, and so is 'West Pasture'
# - there is a hillside of the right altitude
# - directions from Mickleton and Laithkirk church are approximately correct
# - the road nearby is Kelton Lane
# The gauge moved to Mickleton in February 1907.
